headline.print_headline: Defoliant May Be Tied To New List Of Illnesses
headline.seo: Report Sees Agent Orange Link to More Illnesses
headline.main: Report Sees Agent Orange Link to More Illnesses

docs.lead_paragraph: People exposed to Agent Orange appear to be more likely to develop Parkinson’s disease and ischemic heart disease, a panel of experts reports.
docs.snippet: People exposed to Agent Orange appear to be more likely to develop Parkinson’s disease and ischemic heart disease, a panel of experts reports.
